gwt.material.design.client.ui.table.cell

Class TextColumn<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gwt.material.design.client.ui.table.cell.Column<T,String>
      • gwt.material.design.client.ui.table.cell.TextColumn<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the row type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.cell.client.HasCell<T,String>, gwt.material.design.client.base.HasHideOn, gwt.material.design.client.base.HasTextAlign

    public abstract class TextColumn<T>
extends Column<T,String>
    A column that displays its contents with a TextCell and does not make use of view data.
    Author:
    Ben Dol
